Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: Nice game when you have a party or a holiday camping\, playing it with many friends in a large room overnight with projector \,trust me \,it will make a great fun and wonderful memory :)The only thing that makes this game unable to be a perfect game is  that the butterfly effect does not really have a free choice tree\, your choices have limited influences
